FHIR R4 Core Prototype Implementation Guide - November 2019 Release. Based on FHIR Version 4.0.1
Note: this is an initial prototype specification.

XML Format: ValueSet-UKCore-ListCode

Download Raw xml 


<ValueSet xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="UKCore-ListCode"/>
  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>
    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><h2>UK Core List Code</h2><div><p>A ValueSet to identify the purpose of a list.</p>
